header.content: Reads commands from a specified file and stores them for processing.

value.name: file
value.description: The file containing the batch of commands to read.

value.name: repo
value.description: The repository where the file is located (defaults to appRoot).

value.name: dir
value.description: The directory where the file is located (defaults to 'batches').

value.name: appRoot
value.description: The root folder of the app.
